title: Wings of Vengeance
description: A battle between the Vampires and the Immortals has been spreading throughout time. Mathias, born with an extraordinary power to travel between the land of the living and the dead, is able to bring back pure souls from the Mist to help him in this war.Lara was brought over after a brutal death to serve her purpose as a Death Stalker, but at the same time she is serving her own goals. Revenge is the ideal that is keeping her going, but with her own quest nearly at an end she asks Mathias to take back the immortality he gave her so she can leave this world and hopefully be at peace.Rollan isn't making it easy. With the burning love that he has carried for her spilling out, he takes a chance and puts his heart in her hands hoping that it will persuade her to stay.But not everything is as it seems, and the need to find out why she wants to leave causes a rift between all of the Stalkers and not just the two would-be lovers.Can Rollan change her mind? Or is Lara the only one that can change her mind and reach for the happiness she so desperately craves?
author: Kylie Price
